¶ And there was \w war|strong="H4421"\w* between \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* and \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* all their \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.
